mapper.select: SELECT id, category_key, color_series_key, title, description, size, color, price, stock, weight, image_url, sort, status, create_time, update_time FROM diy_material WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diy_material (category_key, color_series_key, title, description, size, color, price, stock, weight, image_url, sort, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{categoryKey}, #{colorSeriesKey}, #{title}, #{description}, #{size}, #{color}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{weight}, #{imageUrl}, #{sort}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE diy_material SET category_key = #{categoryKey}, color_series_key = #{colorSeriesKey}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, size = #{size}, color = #{color}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, weight = #{weight}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE diy_material SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE diy_material SET stock = stock + #{quantity}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{materialId}
